sentence: In short, 83,471 breast cancer cases and 59,199 controls of diverse ancestry were recruited in 80 studies (see Fig. 1A, Additional file 1: Table S1).
In short, 83,471 breast cancer cases and 59,199 controls of diverse ancestry were recruited in 80 studies (see Fig. 1A, Additional file 1: Table S1).

The link of regulatory genetic elements to genes was either based on physical overlap with the coding region, e.g., when an element was located within an intron of the gene, or physical overlap with significantly associated eQTLs for the specific gene (see Fig. 1B).

The link of regulatory genetic elements to genes was either based on physical overlap with the coding region, e.g., when an element was located within an intron of the gene, or physical overlap with significantly associated eQTLs for the specific gene (see Fig. 1B).
Samples were recruited to studies in 33 countries (see Fig. 1A).
The analysis identified two novel gene associations that do not overlap previously reported single-marker-based loci (Fig. 2).
The analysis identified two novel gene associations that do not overlap previously reported single-marker-based loci (Fig. 2).
